plot: A documentary showing how through a cultural exchange of Inca shamanism techniques and western medicine, Peruvian and American societies can be healed.
title: Despacho
plot_es: A documentary showing how through a cultural exchange of Inca shamanism techniques and western medicine, Peruvian and American societies can be healed.
plot_en: A documentary showing how through a cultural exchange of Inca shamanism techniques and western medicine, Peruvian and American societies can be healed.
